channel.title: vim on vim, git, aws and other three-letter words
channel.description: Recent content in vim on vim, git, aws and other three-letter words

item.title: git - use vim with fugitive to resolve merge conflicts
item.description: To use fugitive as you mergetool you can use the following. git config --global mergetool.fugitive.cmd 'vim -f -c "Gdiff" "$MERGED"' git config --global merge.tool fugitive Links stackoverflow fugitive screencast

item.title: vim - replace a word with yanked text
item.description: Copy a word and paste it over other words: yiw yank inner word (copy word under cursor, say "first"). ... Move the cursor to another word (say "second"). viwp select "second", then replace it with "first". ... Move the cursor to another word (say "third"). viw"0p select "third", then replace it with "first".Deleting, changing and yanking text copies the affected text to the unnamed register (""). Yanking text also copies the text to register 0 (“0).
